description:
USN-3353-1 fixed a vulnerability in Heimdal. This update provides the corresponding update for Samba.

Original advisory details:

 Jeffrey Altman, Viktor Dukhovni, and Nicolas Williams discovered
 that Samba clients incorrectly trusted unauthenticated portions
 of Kerberos tickets. A remote attacker could use this to impersonate
 trusted network services or perform other attacks.

samba.description: SMB/CIFS file, print, and login server for Unix

title: Samba vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Samba could allow unintended access to network services.
